n_offsprings.description: Number of offsprings to generate through crossover at each generation.Can be greater or smaller than initial pop_size
n_offsprings.title: Number of Offpsring

prob_crossover.description: Probability of applying crossover between two parents.
prob_crossover.title: Crossover Probability

prob_mutation.description: Probability of applying mutation to each offspring.
prob_mutation.title: Mutatino Probability

std_scaler.description: Scales the standard deviation of the mutation's normal distribution.
std_scaler.title: Mutation Standard Deviation Scaler

tol.description: Termination Criterion.Minimum required improvement of population's best fitness value over a period of generations. Terminates if below.
tol.title: Tolerance of Improvement

period.description: Termination Criterion. Number of passed generations to include when checking for improvement.
period.title: Period of Improvement

cv_tol.description: Termination Criterion.Minimum required improvement of population's best constraint violation value over a period of generations.Terminates if below.
cv_tol.title: Tolerance of Infeasibility Improvement

cv_period.description: Termination Criterion.Number of passed generations to include when checking for constraint violation improvement.
cv_period.title: Period of Infeasibility Improvement

n_max_gen.description: Termination Criterion. Max number of generations before termination.
n_max_gen.title: Maximum Number of Generations

n_max_evals.description: Termination Criterion. Max number of fitness evaluations (Epoch simulations) before termination.
n_max_evals.title: Maximum Number of Simulations

sampling.description: Whether to generate initial population randomly or from estimates.
sampling.title: Sampling Method

pop_size_incr_scalar.description: Scalar value to increase the pop_size and n_offsprings by for the next generation when the number ofoptimal scenarios surpasses pop_size_incr_threshold percent of the pop_size.
pop_size_incr_scalar.title: Automatic Population Size Increase Scaler

pop_size_incr_threshold.description: Percent of the pop_size to set as the threshold to increase the pop_size.
pop_size_incr_threshold.title: Automatic Population Size Increase Threshold

return_least_infeasible.description: Whether or not to return the most feasible of the infeasible solutions if no feasible solution is found.
return_least_infeasible.title: Return Least Infeasible

n_per_sub_portfolio.description: Number of sites per sub portfolio.
n_per_sub_portfolio.title: Number of Sites per Sub Portfolio

n_initialisation_points.description: Number of evaluations to initialise model.
n_initialisation_points.title: Number of Initialisation Trials

num_restarts.description: Number of restarts of the acquisition function optimisation process.
num_restarts.title: Number of Restarts of Acquisition Function Optimisation

raw_samples.description: Number of raw samples to initialise acquisition function optimisation process with.
raw_samples.title: Number of Samples for Acquisition Function Optimisation

mc_samples.title: Size of Sampels for Acquisition Function Optimisation
